verses.roman:
dekhite nānā-bhāva haya vilakṣaṇa
se vailakṣaṇyera nāma 'vilāsa'-bhūṣaṇa

synonyms: dekhite—while seeing; nānā-bhāva—of various ecstasies; haya—there are; vilakṣaṇa—symptoms; se—those; vailakṣaṇyera—of different symptoms; nāma—the name; vilāsa—vilāsa; bhūṣaṇa—ornaments.
translation: "The symptoms of various ecstasies that become manifest at that time are called vilāsa.

purport.content: This is described in the following verse, taken from the Ujjvala-nīlamaṇi (Anubhāva-prakaraṇa 31).
